Phrase: A rapidly developing Phantom Mist swept into the Metro Hole area to engulf the feeling Putra and Vivienne. Versailles and Miyako headed towards the Phantom Mist.

We, the Special Steel Squad, followed them and repelled the Mist Monsters that appeared from within the rapid Phantom Mist. However, as the objective was to retreat, we did not engage in unnecessary combat, but all rushed into the Mist Train cars.

Name: Putra
Phrase: That was close~. If we had continued our course, we would have been swallowed up by the Phantom Mist.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: You really did save our lives. Merci, Versailles and Miyako.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Glad we could make it.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Can you say we made it though...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: The Train is inside a spectacular Phantom Mist right now. On top of that, we're surrounded by countless Mist Monsters.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: We can't just go back towards the city. We'll bring along a lot of monsters with us.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Can't Islington's magic do anything about this? You know, we've seen it before, 'The Lightning of St. Iris', it's like the end of the world.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I asked her about it, but she said it's better not to. We don't know the nature of the Phantom Mist, so she doesn't know what will happen. It might affect the Metro Hole in some way.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: If it's the demons around the train, they will disappear in time. This Mist will clear eventually after we hold positions for awhile.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Wait? Really?

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Speaking of which... You said earlier that the Phantom Mist was aimed at the Metro Hole. What do you mean?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Sometimes the Phantom Mist is attracted to Metro Holes that have been opened. We too, only found out about this fact after the Metro Hole appeared.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Remember that Phantom Mist tends to form near railways. Not only is it easy to generate, but it also has the property of being attracted.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: There are two types of Mist, Phantom Mist inside the Metro Hole and Phantom Mist generated outside of it. When Phantom Mist inside the hole mixes with the Phantom Mist outside, a troublesome enemy appears. Both Versailles and I have suffered from this doubled Phantom Mist many times.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Where does the Phantom Mist that is drawn into the Metro Hole go?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Certainly...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The Metro Hole where Miyako and her team were fighting was also attracting Phantom Mist, wasn't it? The Phantom Mist had gone, right?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: The Metro Hole where we were fighting was filled with an extremely thick Mist. I'm sure it got mixed in there...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Yes, that's possible. But it could also be otherwise.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Otherwise...?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The Metro Hole where Miyako and her team were fighting is during Tageslicht, so the Phantom Mist wasn't drawn in during the day?

Name: Miyako
Phrase: No, even during Tageslicht, there were times when Phantom Mist from the forest was attracted to the Metro Hole.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Come to think of it, where did that Phantom Mist go? Did it flow into Iris Cloud?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: How long has this Metro Hole been here? That might change where the Phantom Mist headed to.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: I see... Just because a tunnel has been opened doesn't mean it will always led to the same place.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That means there might be other Metro Holes that have been opened.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's what Yoshino meant. And the friends you've lost track of might have slipped out of other tunnels.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: So don't give up and keep looking for them. You'll find them. Don't worry.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yoshino-chan...

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yes, you're right. I'm sure they're somewhere else. I don't know if it's Iris Cloud or Iris Metro, but there must be lots of other metro Holes out there.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Thank you, Yoshino-chan.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: If you're ever in trouble, we'll be there for you.

Name: Putra
Phrase: It's like, these two seem to know each other because they're smart.

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: That Miyako girl is pretty sharp too. I thought she was hiding behind Versailles, but she comes forward when she needs to and says exactly what she needs to say.

Name: Islington
Phrase: The number of monsters is decreasing. There's no sign of them attacking us.

Name: Mary
Phrase: The Mist is fading. It's drifting deeper and deeper into the tunnel.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Drifting away? To where?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Beyond the Gate. I don't know where that is.

Name: Islington
Phrase: How much do you believe their story?

Name: Mary
Phrase: Basically I believe everything they say.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Of course, from the former Resistance member. You left the Order to pursue your dreams.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Even you have realised that, haven't you? The magic Versailles and Miyako used is not from this world. It's different from the power we feel from things from the otherworlds too. It is a power that I and Ricardo have never felt before.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Essentially it's the same power that Train Knights have. Maybe there's something like the blessings of an alternate universe St. Iris God.

Name: Mary
Phrase: As long as the Railways and Phantom Mist exist in Iris Metro, there is no doubt that the power that Versailles and Miyako have is the power to fight the Phantom Mist.

Name: Mary
Phrase: And if someone as powerful as Miyako and Versailles were in Iris Cloud, there is no way that the Allied Forces could have overlooked them.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Those two haven't shown their true colours yet, but they're pretty strong. I even think Queensway at present may not even be able to beat Versailles.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Miyako's quite the sorceress too. She could rival Shimoamazu the Second.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Iris Metro is real. They are the 'chosen ones' of the other world. Because the Divine Children don't have the power, the knights and soldiers are given bigger roles.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I think we should proceed.

Name: Islington
Phrase: I haven't said anything yet.

Name: Mary
Phrase: But were you going to ask, 'Should we go?'

Name: Islington
Phrase: No, no. I wasn't going to say that.

Name: Mary
Phrase: Then what were you going to say?

Name: Islington
Phrase: I wanted to say 'Mary, you've never travelled underground before, have you?'

Name: Mary
Phrase: Yes.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Let's go. Mr. Conductor.
Islington said, looking towards the end of the pitch-black tunnel.

In her position, She should not be able to make this suggestion lightly. To proceed further without a detailed investigation would entail considerable risk. In the worst case scenario, there is even the possibility of losing the entirety of the Special Steel Squad.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I'm sure that the military and the upper echelons of the Order would definitely try to avoid this risk.
That's why the Allied Forces could not clear the Mist. That's why the Order couldn't protect the Divine Children.
They have the will to change something, but they don't act. Knowing that, unless they act, nothing will change.

It is always the Out-Siders who jump into a deadly situation. The Knights were quick to fall backwards. Even the Royal Guard, which is reputed to be the strongest, stays in the royal castle with its Divine Children. If they don't fight in the outside world, the Mist of the world will never lift...

Name: Mary
Phrase: You said the same thing as Ricardo. Like mother like son.

Name: Mary
Phrase: I am Mary Rosegarden. I will follow you everywhere as your subordinate. I will fight with you to the ends of the sea and to the depths of Hell itself.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Good. Let's tell the others then.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: 'Um, Sir Conductor, Lady Islington... May I have a word?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Yes? What's the matter?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: After a bit of discussion, we've come to the conclusion that we should continue on the Mist Train to the end of the Metro Hole.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: This Phantom Mist is likely flowing out beyond the Gate into Iris Metro. Versailles and Miyako said so. If that much Phantom Mist flows out that way... The Iris Metro garrison won't be able to hold out.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Yes, that's right. If there is an underground universe beyond the Metro Holes, that's a very big possibility. The monster numbers are reducing, and the Mist could lift at any moment.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Iris Metro needs reinforcements, and they need them now. If we continue into the Metro Hole, we'll get there in time.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Right, you want to go?

Name: Queensway
Phrase: And you, Lady Islington?

Name: Islington
Phrase: No, not me. Mary really wants to see the underworld though~

Name: Mary
Phrase: It's unanimous. We've decided to journey on. Conductor and Islington are on the same page as you.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Sir Conductor...
...It's decided.
The SSS will begin investigating the mysterious tunnel that has appeared on the railway line. It may be the source of the Phantom Mist, so this will also be tasked as a mission objective.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Meanwhile, Mary and I will be monitoring as key witnesses. We'll all travel underground together～♪

Name: Islington
Phrase: Paddington~? Are we ready to go~?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Of course we are! We can run at full throttle at any time!

Name: Islington
Phrase: Mhm, it's good to be cheerful, but don't run at full throttle, alright♪
Our objective is known as the Metro Hole. Large-scale gating may be occurring in the tunnel. All personnel to brace for impact and enemy ambushes.

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Roger! Mist Train, proceeding to Metro world!
